com.werdpressed.partisan.rundo.utils

Class SubtractStringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.werdpressed.partisan.rundo.utils.SubtractStringUtils

  • public final class SubtractStringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods which operate on char[], predominantly for use with SubtractStrings

        Reverses input char[].
        Parameters:
        input - char[] to reverse.
        Returns:
        input char[] reversed.

      • isArrayEqualWithOmission

        public static boolean isArrayEqualWithOmission(char[] arrOne,
                               char[] arrTwo,
                               int omissionStart,
                               int omissionEnd)
        Determines whether the contents of two arrays are equal, after a section from one array is removed. Used to determine whether text has been replaced, or added to/deleted from.
        Parameters:
        arrOne - First array
        arrTwo - Second array
        omissionStart - Start index of section to remove from the longer or arrOne and arrTwo.
        omissionEnd - End index of section to remove.
        Returns:
        True if both arrOne and arrTwo are equal after section specified in omissionStart and omissionEnd is removed from the longer of the two.

      • omitCharArrayEntriesAtIndexes

        public static char[] omitCharArrayEntriesAtIndexes(char[] arr,
                                   int omissionStart,
                                   int omissionEnd)
        Removes the section between the index positions at omissionStart and omissionEnd from arr.
        Parameters:
        arr - Input array
        omissionStart - Start index of section to remove.
        omissionEnd - End index of section to remove.
        Returns:
        The array arr, less the section between omissionStart and omissionEnd.
